```{r}
library(AutomaticMGCFA)
```

## Quick Start (Raw Data)

```{r}
inp <- mgcfa_prepare_input(data = dat, group = "grp")
out <- mgcfa_run_simple(
  model = "F =~ x1 + x2 + x3 + x4",
  input = inp,
  partial_auto_search = "always"
)
print(out)
```

## Quick Start (Summary Matrices)

```{r}
sum_in <- mgcfa_make_summary(
  data = dat,
  group = "grp",
  variables = c("x1", "x2", "x3", "x4"),
  summary_profile = "raw_equivalent"
)

out_sum <- mgcfa_auto(
  model_type = "custom",
  model = "F =~ x1 + x2 + x3 + x4",
  input = sum_in$mgcfa_args
)
```

## Reporting

```{r}
rep <- mgcfa_report(out, include_plots = TRUE)
rep
```
